name: WhatisSkinBrushing
0:
”Alexa, what is skin brushing”
”Alexa, open what is skin brushing”
”Alexa, play what is skin brushing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what is skin brushing
des:
Do you want to know about an ancient secret yet modern way for your skin to look great and to also be healthier? This Alexa skill tells you about Skin Brushing, Three Easy Steps and Fast Facts. It is brought to you by Sublime Beauty, who offers a popular Skin Brush and "how to" guide on Amazon at https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00CBHZPNW. Or just search Sublime Beauty Skin Brush.

Have fun with this easy wellness practice that only takes 10 minutes per day and makes you look and feel great.

P.S. Do you like podcasts? Listen to the Sublime Beauty founder Kathy Heshelow talk about Skin Brushing on the show EHEALTH RADIO NETWORK: https://www.podbean.com/site/search/index/?sourceid=navbar_search&v=skin%20brushing%20kathy%20heshelow
